Nellie Mae Abrams (1946-2005) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe

A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting collective. E gosipụtara nka ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Gund Gallery na Kenyon College, ma tinyé ya na nchịkọta nke Minneapolis Institute of Art na Philadelphia Museum of Art. Ọ bụ nwá nwanyị Annie Mae Young, ónyé bụkwa ónyé na-eme akwa.
